Maude Carman

  1. Foster Name: Maude
  2. Foster Family: William Winter
  3. Location of Family: David City, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: David City, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 8
  7. Date of Birth: Unknown
  8. Gender: female
  9. Married Name: Maude Kauman
  10. Spouse Name: Nicolas Kauman
  11. Source: OTR, 318; People's Banner (David City, NE), 23 November 1916; "The Orphan Trains Come to Butler County, "David City Banner Press, 5 February 1981; 1920 United States Federal Census.
